u.a: $EX $C baby GURGLING WHILST MUM WATCHES TV
$CO a LONG GAP OF NO TALKING

CHAT.comment: Mother and father talking; three lines
Nursery rhyme: Ruba tub tub three men in a tub etc.

u.a: $WH mum SINGS A NURSERY RHYTHM BLEEP
$BC baby ASLEEP PARENTS TALKING TO EACH OTHER MORNING BABY CRYING AND SUCKING HER THUMB
